sentences.en: "Take That" are the best group in the whole world. So there.
sentences.cn: “接招”乐队是世界上最好的组合，就是这样的。

sentences.en: a number of stone churches survive in whole or in part.
sentences.cn: 许多石头建的教堂全部或部分留存下来。

sentences.en: can expect sunny weather, on the whole.
sentences.cn: 大体上会有睛朗的天气

sentences.en: disliked the acting but enjoyed the play as a whole.
sentences.cn: 不喜欢表演但整体上喜欢这个剧

sentences.en: Five whole pages of script were devoted to rubbishing her political opponents.
sentences.cn: 整整5页讲稿都是对她的政敌的诋毁。

sentences.en: he was the nicest person in the whole world.
sentences.cn: 他是全世界最好的人。

sentences.en: Her whole body began to buckle, unbalancing the ladder.
sentences.cn: 她整个身体开始弯曲，搞得梯子倾侧起来。

sentences.en: His whole attitude bugs me.
sentences.cn: 他的整个态度都让我讨厌。

sentences.en: I don’t believe she’s telling us the whole story (= all the facts ).
sentences.cn: 我认为她没有告诉我们全部实情。

sentences.en: I gradually got rather disillusioned with the whole setup of the university.
sentences.cn: 渐渐地，我对大学的整个体制感到相当失望。

sentences.en: It was months before the whole truth came out.
sentences.cn: 几个月以后才真相大白。

sentences.en: on the whole, a happy marriage.
sentences.cn: 总的看来，是个幸福的结合

sentences.en: send in the troops, aircraft, nuclear submarine experts, the whole nine yards.
sentences.cn: 派军队、飞机、核潜艇专家等一切能派上用场的人或物。

sentences.en: The individual's whole personality appears to be permanently warped.
sentences.cn: 这个人的整个人格似乎被永远地扭曲了。

sentences.en: The Ministry desperately tried to hush up the whole affair.
sentences.cn: 部里拼命想隐瞒整个事件。

sentences.en: The president was clearly exasperated by the whole saga.
sentences.cn: 整个事件显然让总统很恼火。

sentences.en: The whole car shuddered with an almost frightening surge of power.
sentences.cn: 油门猛然加大到几乎让人恐惧的程度，整个汽车剧烈震颤着。

sentences.en: The whole idea was to give history a happy gloss.
sentences.cn: 整个想法就是要粉饰历史。

sentences.en: The whole place was a bit of a dog's dinner, really.
sentences.cn: 整个地方乌烟瘴气的，真的。

sentences.en: The whole thing (= everything about the situation ) just makes me sick.
sentences.cn: 这一切简直让我恶心。

sentences.en: The whole world holds its breath for this speech.
sentences.cn: 整个世界都屏住呼吸等待这一讲话。

sentences.en: The wine towns encountered are, on the whole, quiet and modest.
sentences.cn: 所到的酒镇总的来说都是宁静祥和的。

sentences.en: This whole plan has been most carefully mapped out.
sentences.cn: 整个方案的规划极为精细。

sentences.en: We ate the whole cake in about ten minutes.
sentences.cn: 大约十分钟的时间，我们就把整个蛋糕都给吃完了。

sentences.en: We just sat around and watched TV the whole time (= the only thing we did was watch television ).
sentences.cn: 我们一直都只是坐着看看电视。

sentences.en: You could waste your whole life on a pipe-dream.
sentences.cn: 白日梦会荒废你一生。

sentences.en: You have your whole life ahead of you!
sentences.cn: 你有一辈子要过呢！

sentences.en: You've given a whole list of names and addresses at the back.
sentences.cn: 你已经在末尾完整地列出了名字和地址。

words.tran_cn: 健全的；有益健康的；合乎卫生的；审慎的
卫生地；有益健康地；审慎地；安全地

phrases.tran_cn: 崭新的世界（电影《阿拉丁》主题曲）
所有部分和方面都考虑到；整个看来
在大多数情况下；大体上，基本上
(非正式，主北美)任何可能的事；任何可得到的东西
全部时间（自始至终）；一向
全血（未除去任何成分的血液）；全血亲
一生；终身保险；终身寿险
全麦粉（保存全部的营养成分的面粉）

trans.tran_en: something that consists of a number of parts, but is considered as a single unit
